description:
The panminus is a script to get, unpack, build and install modules from CPAN.

Security Fix(es):

* perl-App-cpanminus: Insecure HTTP in App::cpanminus Allows Code Execution Vulnerability (CVE-2024-45321)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
name: RLSA-2024:10219
topic:
An update is available for perl-Module-CPANfile, perl-App-cpanminus, module.perl-File-pushd, module.perl-String-ShellQuote, perl-CPAN-DistnameInfo, perl-File-pushd, module.perl-Parse-PMFile, module.perl-CPAN-Meta-Check, module.perl-Module-CPANfile, perl-Parse-PMFile, perl-String-ShellQuote, module.perl-CPAN-DistnameInfo, perl-CPAN-Meta-Check, module.perl-App-cpanminus.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
